column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I've been here on several occasions
column3: and have never been disappointed.  The service is amazing
column4: and each time the server has made helpful recommendations on dishes to try
column5: amount of food that will be enough
column6: etc.  My favorite dishes include the beef tips
column10: the bacon wrapped dates.  The desserts are adorable little nibbles
column11: just enough to satisfy the sweet tooth after a savory meal.
